title: F35 Mini-Ep 7: Hobbies and Self-Care for Caregivers
itunes:title: F35 Mini-Ep 7: Hobbies and Self-Care for Caregivers
itunes:subtitle: In this week's mini-episode, Kate and Doree answer a listener question about finding hobbies in adulthood. (Yes, Netflix counts.) Then, they give advice about caring for yourself while caring for a terminally ill loved one, and respond to...
description:
In this week's mini-episode, Kate and Doree answer a listener question about finding hobbies in adulthood. (Yes, Netflix counts.) Then, they give advice about caring for yourself while caring for a terminally ill loved one, and respond to a voicemail from a listener who's experiencing sexual harassment in the workplace. 

To learn more, visit forever35podcast.com.

Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
